strats.name: Leave With Runway - Frozen Sova
note: Wait 80 seconds for the Sova to get into position, then freeze it to bridge the gap and significantly extend the runway.
The other Sovas can be farmed or used as a backup.
strats.devNote: Because the Sovas are global, strats could be added that start from the other doors to tighten the total frame count, but it will typically require heatProof either way.

strats.name: G-Mode Regain Mobility
strats.note: It takes about 1.5 minutes for the Sova to get to this door and hit Samus.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
strats.note: Wait for the Sovas to wind around the room and reach the top door. This takes about 1 minute and 15 seconds.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova, Two Supers
note: Use a Super to knock a Sova off as it exits the morph tunnel, then shoot the shot block in time to let it pass.
Use another Super to knock it off the top runway so it can climb the left wall and reach the door.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, Leave With Spark
devNote: Technically Samus isn't moving off-camera but is close to the edge;
'canOffScreenMovement' is for the difficulty of timing the unmorph, given limited visibility of the end of the passage and the Sova.
If a Power Bomb is available, then lag from the explosion can make the movement much easier.

strats.name: G-Mode, Simple Blind Movement
strats.devNote: It is probably possible to farm the Sovas at this door, but it would be difficult and slow and isn't expected.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph, Simple Blind Movement
strats.devNote: It is probably possible to farm the Sovas at this door, but it would be difficult and slow and isn't expected.

strats.name: Screw Attack
strats.devNote: The bottom Fune shoots a fireball which wastes all of the time save of a Leave with Runway strat.

strats.name: Frozen Funes Leave with Runway - Kill Fune
R-Mode Spark Interrupt
note: Kill the Funes first, then the Sovas. Shinecharge at the bottom and use heat damage to interrupt.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
strats.note: Avoid the fireballs while waiting for the Sovas. If the fireball is going to be at a bad cycle, it can help to kill the first Sova.

strats.name: G-Mode, Sova Farm
strats.note: It is possible to kill the Sovas and pick up their drops during a pause abuse.
strats.devNote: The Sovas will not give drops if there are too many fireballs, but this shouldnt be a problem when leaving through the bottom door.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport
note: To minimize heat damage, immediately after landing use Grapple to open the door while running towards it, then jump over the gap and through the door.
If the door is grappled too late, it may interfere with the jump.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
strats.note: Wait for the Sovas to wind around the room and reach the top door. This takes about 1 minute and 15 seconds.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova, Two Supers
note: Use a Super to knock a Sova off as it exits the morph tunnel, get to and shoot the shot block in time to let it pass.
Use another Super to knock it off the top runway so it can climb the left wall and reach the door.
There is enough time to go around the left side of the room if Samus can't climb the right side.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph, Blind Movement
strats.note: Kill the Sovas or wait at around 25 seconds for them to get out of the way before going down and passing them while climbing to the top door.
strats.detailNote: It is possible to wait 2.5 minutes for the Sovas to return on camera to be sure Samus won't touch them.
devNote: The single tile ledge at this door doesn't seem to make it any slower to exit.
It is probably possible to farm the Sovas at this door, but it would be difficult and isn't expected.

strats.name: Leave With Runway - Frozen Sova
note: Wait 3 minutes for the Sova to get into position, or 100 seconds with Morph by going ahead of them to break the shot blocks as they get there.
This can be further reduced to 45 seconds with a Super by knocking a Sova off after it exits the morph tunnel.
The other Sovas can be farmed or used as a backup.
strats.devNote: Because the Sovas are global, strats could be added that start from the other doors to tighten the total frame count, but it will typically require heatProof either way.

strats.name: G-Mode Regain Mobility
note: It takes about 2.5 minutes for the Sova to get to this door and hit Samus.
Alternatively, use a Super as the third Sova has started going off screen to speed it up to 40 seconds.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
note: It takes about 2.5 minutes for the Sova to get to this door and hit Samus.
With Morph, Samus can shoot the shot block as the Sova is coming down to save some time.
Alternatively, use a Super as the third Sova has started going off screen to speed it up to 40 seconds.

strats.name: R-Mode Spark Interrupt
note: Kill the Funes first, then the Sovas. Shinecharge at the bottom and use heat damage to interrupt.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
strats.note: Avoid the fireballs while waiting for the Sovas. If the fireball is going to be at a bad cycle, it can help to kill the first Sova.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph, Simple Blind Movement
strats.note: Kill the Sovas or wait at least 20 seconds for them to get out of the way before going to the bottom door.
strats.detailNote: It is slightly safer but very slow to wait 2.5 minutes for the Sovas to return on camera to be sure Samus won't touch them.
strats.devNote: It is probably possible to farm the Sovas at this door, but it would be difficult and isn't expected.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph, Blind Camera Fix
note: Kill the Sovas or wait at around 25 seconds for them to get out of the way before going down.
Exit G-mode on the first ledge on the left, then jump and press against the right wall to touch the camera scroll block and fix the camera.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, Shinespark
devNote: Unlocking the door would be possible but would require more than the default amount of heat frames, which would need testing.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, Shinespark
devNote: Unlocking the door would be possible but would require more than the default amount of heat frames, which would need testing.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
strats.note: Wait for the Sovas to wind around the room and reach the top door. This takes about 1 minute and 15 seconds.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova, Two Supers
note: Use a Super to knock a Sova off as it exits the morph tunnel, get to and shoot the shot block in time to let it pass.
Use another Super to knock it off the top runway so it can climb the left wall and reach the door.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport
note: To minimize heat damage, immediately after landing use Grapple to open the door while running towards it, then jump over the gap and through the door.
If the door is grappled too late, it may interfere with the jump.

strats.name: G-Mode
strats.devNote: The single tile ledge at this door doesn't seem to make it any slower to exit.

strats.name: G-Mode, Sova Farm
note: It is possible to kill the Sovas and pick up their drops during a pause abuse, but they will only give drops if there are not too many Fune fireballs.
With a ledge grab onto the top platform, it is possible to get all the Funes off camera. Alternatively, it is possible to kill or repeatedly freeze them.
devNote: The single tile ledge at this door doesn't seem to make it any slower to exit.
The Power Bomb kill could be done with artificial morph, but it's not worth modeling.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, Shinespark (Power Bomb Sovas)
Come In Shinecharging, Shinespark (Power Bomb Sovas)
Samus Eater Teleport, X-Ray Climb
note: Jump into the second ceiling Samus Eater in Hellway.
After teleporting and passing through the transition, X-Ray climb to reach the space above, to the right of the morph tunnel.
Samus will be off-camera, so it may not be easy to tell when the climb is done.
devNote: Other Samus Eaters can also probably work.

strats.name: G-Mode, Simple Blind Movement
strats.devNote: It is probably possible to farm the Sovas at this door, but it would be difficult and slow and isn't expected.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph, Simple Blind Movement
strats.devNote: It is probably possible to farm the Sovas at this door, but it would be difficult and slow and isn't expected.

strats.name: Crystal Flash
strats.note: Kill the Fune before Crystal Flashing.

strats.name: R-Mode Spark Interrupt
note: Kill the Funes first, then the Sovas. Shinecharge at the bottom and use heat damage to interrupt.

strats.name: G-Mode Regain Mobility
strats.note: It takes about 20 seconds for the Sova to get to this door and hit Samus.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
strats.note: Avoid the fireballs while waiting for the Sovas. If the fireball is going to be at a bad cycle, it can help to kill the first Sova.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharged
strats.note: Reaching the Morph hole can be tricky with SpeedBooster but no HiJump.

strats.name: Tank Damage
strats.devNote: Base IBJ should kill the Sovas or go around.

strats.name: Kill Sovas
note: Either use a Power Bomb or Wave + Plasma to kill all the Sovas off-camera,
or if heat protection is available, wait for all the Sovas to come out of the tunnel.

strats.name: Speedrun Ice Beam Entry
note: Smoothly jump into the morph tunnel while shooting the first Sova.
Unmorph at the end of the tunnel to clear more Sovas as needed.

strats.name: Damage Boost
strats.note: Wait for the Sova to leave the tunnel and jump morph into them to bounce up into the hole.

strats.name: Sova Freeze
strats.note: Freeze a Sova once it enters one of the slots on the wall and then use it as a platform.

strats.name: Leave with Runway - Dead Fune
strats.devNote: FIXME: unlocksDoors: powerbomb would not have an ammo cost as one is used as part of the strat.

strats.name: Base
strats.devNote: It is faster to go around than to climb with Ice.

strats.name: Tank Damage
strats.note: The Sovas should be killed if you are heat proof.
